page.description: The <OBJECT>.ToolbarControlEnable() method enables or disables the specified item on the control bar.

argument.name: index
argument.description: The number of the control bar item. The leftmost item is number 1.

case.description: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.title: Example
section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") frm.toolbarchange("Query") frm.toolbarcontrolenable(10,.f.)
